extendedInfo.description: What if you could take the best construction calculator and fix it.  Thatâs right ... you love it, it has served you well, and you stand by it ... but could it do more?  Could it be easier to use?*** I have a lot invested a lot of myself in this app and want it to be the best construction calculator app.  IF YOU ENCOUNTER ANY DIFFICULTIES, PLEASE CONTACT ME AT INFO-AT-BUILDCALC.COM - I REALLY WANT TO HELP! ***After nine months of development and testing by pros from around the world, BuildCalc for Android is ready to give you more - more function and more answers with less complexity, less hassle, and less confusion. MORE FUNCTIONALITY: â¢ Advanced Baluster Function: Complete layout of railing and staircase balusters with less guess work - and with all the flexibility you need for every custom job. â¢ Advanced Stair function: Stair layouts for professional results - including dimensioned drawings of your Stringer, Stringer Installation, and Finished Staircase. And you can email a PDF of these drawings right from BuildCalc so you can print them or share them. â¢ Fence Function: Give BuildCalc a fence row length and it will tell you how many posts, rails, pickets, and or panels you need. â¢ Interactive Functions: The Stair, Baluster, Compound Miter, Diagonal and Hip/Valley functions are now fully interactive. Want to change input values? Change the Run? Switch between Regular and Irregular Hip Roof analysis? You can do this and your results will be updated automatically - without you needing to remember what key to press. â¢ New Full Daylight Visibility ModeMORE ANSWERS: â¢ You are no longer tied down to: only one brick, block or tile size for the masonry function; a fixed number of drywall sheet sizes; only one footer cross sectional area; or one size of shingles and sheathing. If you donât see the size you want, you can add as many as you need. And for area input, you can store your custom sizes in Length x Width format, so you wonât have to do mental gymnastics to figure out what was the dimensions for that last size you stored. â¢ Want to cut your hip roof rafter using a miter saw ... or a circular saw using a hand-held protractor? With a tap of a button, BuildCalc will automatically switch between Miter Saw and Protractor results. BuildCalc can do this for Compound Miters, too. â¢ Sheathing Angles, Purlin Angles, Gable Area, Backing Angles, Plan Angles, Rough vs. Finished Stair Layout Dimensions, Stringer Throat, Stringer installation dimensions ... and a lot more not found on other construction calculators. LESS COMPLEXITY AND LESS HASSLE: â¢ Tired of having to press and press and press buttons to get the results of a calculation? BuildCalc puts an end to this. For all advanced functions, you get ALL of your results in list form with just one or two key taps. â¢ And, rather than having to write down those results, all advanced functions allow you to save your results  so you can recall the complete results at your convenience. â¢ Less âquirksâ. Have you been annoyed by arcane key stroke sequences on other construction calculators? We are too. BuildCalc streamlined the keystrokes to do a better job of giving you less âerrorsâ and more results. Donât remember what you have to enter before a Hip Rafter or Stair calculation? Well, now you donât have to. BuildCalc will provide you with a check list of inputs and on-the-spot help to get it right. â¢ Drywall and Masonry âRoom Modeâ: If you have stored a Length, Width and Height for a room, BuildCalc will give you the Drywall or Masonry required for the walls and the ceiling / floor - with only a tap of the Drywall or Masonry button. No more pondering over complex key sequences ... it just works.â¢ Full Construction MasterÂ® Pro emulation.  BuildCalc is in no way affiliated with Calculated Industries, owners of the Construction Master trademark.TAGS: Construction, Calculator, Pro, Architect, Contractor, Master Carpenter, Miter, Hip Roof, Masonry, Rafter, Stair

reviews.title: It\'s a no Brainer
reviews.comment: The CMC is prehistoric compared to BuildCalc. This is the first app everyone in construction should buy, period. It\'s a no brainer to use and it has display screens that give you the information to actually build something. The auto generated stair PDF files with your rise, run, stringer layout dimensions sets a new standard for phone/tablet apps. Just brilliant.
reviews.author: Sim Ayers

reviews.title: Great calculator
reviews.comment: The best on the market. Does everything! And then some. Almost too much.
reviews.author: ROD Wolodkewitsch

reviews.title: Better than construction master!
reviews.comment: The only thing that makes this better than CM is ability to email solutions. The radius function brings up a whole separate screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This app works very very well.  Thanks!
reviews.author: Tim Uhler

reviews.title: Better than Construction Master
reviews.comment: When I changed from iphone to Android I could not bring over my Construction master app that I had purchased. I know a few fellow contractors that use this app, and they told me it does everything the Cm does...  and more.      It\'s true. I\'ve used this app almost everyday for over 6 month.   It is all you need, doesn\'t seem to have any bugs.  I highly recommend   5 stars
reviews.author: John Wood

reviews.title: Top Notch
reviews.comment: I barely use my Construction Master since Buildcalc. Excellent app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Couldn\'t work without it.
reviews.comment: I\'m a carpenter and I love this app. From simple conversions and aiding in estimating to doing stairs and fences this app is well worth the money. Kudos to the developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: buildcalc
reviews.comment: Best thing out there for anybody in contruction. Look out \"Construction Master Pro\", new kid on the block! And he\'s way badder than you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stylin!
reviews.comment: Probably overbought as I\'m in building repair, but just having all tools in that this app has, well worth the money!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most needed app
reviews.comment: Best calculator you can get.  $30 cheaper than you can buy in a store and has more functions.  Great customer service and updates. Must have.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great program when it loads
reviews.comment: Had the program for over two months and it does an excellent job in calculating most aspects of framing and other construction projects. Unfortunately, the program seizes up or doesn\'t load most of the time lately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Construction Calculator!!!
reviews.comment: I have paid versions of the big players and BuildCalc blows them away with the amount info and ease of use. Seen features of future release, WOW!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: John
reviews.comment: Best calculator on the market for remodel and new construction. Stair steps, rails, and balusters become a breeze.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bigweazer
reviews.comment: Absolutely amazing but why can I use it anymore? I already paid for it once now they want me to pay again??? And again!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
